Node.definition: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which human experience displeasure, which is said to reside in their heart (לֵב) ◄ and is caused by their own condition or by someone else

= contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; ► used for weighing objects; sometimes used figuratively in expressions describing people's status or integrity or the seriousness of a situation in terms of weight

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= state in which multiple events are connected
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

= minute fragments; ◄ resulting from wearing down of esp. siliceous rocks and found covering parts of the sea shore, river beds, deserts, etc.; ► contains materials for the production of dye and glass; ≈ symbol of large quantity
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= state in which objects have relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.
= action by which humans speak without proper reflection ahead of time

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= poisonous fluid; ◄ secreted by serpents, scorpions, etc. and introduced into body of victim by bite or sting; ► used by these animals to kill their prey and/or defend themselves against their natural enemies; ≈ often used to denote suffering and injury in a more general sense as well
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
= state in which someone experiences an overwhelming fear
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= wild donkey of a relatively large size but with relatively small ears; it has a fawn color with a whitish chest and belly; ◄ Persian Wild Ass or Onager, Equus hemonius; ≈ associated with both untameable wildness and sexual desire
= a general term for plants, ► used as food by humans and animals; ≈ associated with frailty, but also with prosperity

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= to make the characteristic deep sustained sound of a cow
= mixture ◄ consisting of entire plants, including leaves, stalks, and grain; ► served as food for domestic animals
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= food that does not have much taste ◄ due to the lack of salt
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= white crystalline substance, mainly consisting of sodium chloride; ► normally used for seasoning or preserving food; ≈ associated with infertility of the soil but also with permanence

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= the flavor characteristics of certain types of food

= either: purslane, a plant with a thick slimy juice, or: mallow, a bushy shrub with oval leaves, of which the buds and the young leaves are edible; ◄ |iSuaeda asphaltica |i*or |iAtriplex halimus|i*; ► may serve as food; ≈ regarded as not very tasty|= the yellow internal part of a bird’s egg, which is rich in protein and fat
= state in which humans and deities are unwilling to assent to a suggestion or proposal
= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state of ill health
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= action by which humans experience a desire for something to happen and communicate this to (other) humans or deities in the hope that they will intenvene on their behalf

= state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to be willing|to accept (to do something)
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are willing to do something; often used in polite speech to soften one's request or to underline its sincerity
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: to crush; hence: = causative action by which a deity inflicts deadly wounds on a human being or animal ◄ as if crushing that person with a heavy object
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event

Node.gloss: to cut off|to do away with
Node.definition: = causative action by which a deity ends someone's life, as if cutting that person off from the community of the living
= state in which humans experience relief after a period of stress, ◄ due to various possible reasons
= state of strong fear and distress, compared to the state of mind of a woman in labor; ► often accompanied by physical side effects, like writhing and trembling
= state in which an event is relatively low in intensity ◄ as if being merciful
= causative action by which humans refrain from sharing information with others
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event

Node.gloss: to be slow to anger|to be patient
Node.definition: literally: to prolong (= delay) one's anger; hence: = to be not given to anger

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= made out of bronze
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier

Node.gloss: to drive out|to cast out|to disperse
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to leave their place or position using force

= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events|literally: melting or molten; hence: = state in which humans have lost all courage

= a person with whom someone has a bond of mutual affection and respect and trust|= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God
= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior
= fellow member of the same group of people, not necessarily relatives, sharing a bond of affection, employment, or a common purpose

Node.gloss: to act unfaithfully|to be treacherous|to deal treacherously|to break faith|to betray
Node.definition: = pattern of behavior by which humans act in a way which shows a lack of truthfulness and commitment, both in words and deeds
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= river bed that contains water in the rainy season only; ≈ considered as deceptive as one never can never be entirely sure as to whether they contain water or not
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= process by which an object becomes dark in color
= water that has frozen to ice or snow and gleams like crystal

= frozen crystallized water vapor in the form of very white flakes which fall as precipitation from the sky and cover the ground during freezing cold weather; as soon as the temperature rises above freezing, it melts and becomes water; ≈ associated with cold, whiteness, or purity
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= process by which ice becomes liquid ◄ as a result of a rise in temperature
= process by which liquids disappear from existence, as a result of warm weather
= process by which the atmosphere becomes warm or hot
= process by which something ceases to exist
literally: to twist the course of one's way; hence: = action by which humans change direction
= group of travelling merchants

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= location that is devoid of any life and without any structure or order

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= group of travelling merchants
= region, identified with Tayma, an oasis; ◄ located in N Arabia; regarded as founded by one of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) sons
= group of travelers
= country; ◄ exact location unknown; ► known for its wealth and actively involved in trading; regarded as descendants of a man with the same name; its queen visited king Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)

Node.gloss: to look for|to wait for|to hope for
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

Node.gloss: to be confident|to be unsuspecting|to be secure
Node.definition: = state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= process by which humans experience a strong emotion of shame
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= event that causes people to lose their inner strength and courage

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which humans transfer the possession of an object to someone else
literally: strength; hence: = the possessions that people have gathered through their strength and ability

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of
Node.definition: = relation denoting that someone performs a certain event for the benefit of someone or something else
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= state in which a person is a strong and powerful enemy, who is thinks high of himself and is prone to violence, and usually does not fear God
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire knowledge, a skill, or a certain type of behavior
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which someone purposely refrains from responding, either with words or with actions

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans act wrongly, though without the intention to do so

Node.gloss: to instruct|to give instruction|to teach|to give understanding|to explain
Node.definition: = pattern of actions by which someone helps others to gain knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= state in which humans are morally and ethically right

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans or deities express their disapproval of something with words
= action by which humans or deities express their disapproval of something with words
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans or deities express their disapproval of something with words
= action by which humans or deities exercise their minds in order to determine a course of action that will achieve a certain purpose
literally: breath or wind; hence: = action by which humans speak words with no substance or value
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded

Node.gloss: to give up|to consider useless|to consider hopeless
Node.definition: = process by which someone resigns to being unable to change a situation, and gives up trying to do so

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor
literally: to let lots fall; hence: = causative action by which humans throw lots in order to select individuals or groups from among a large group
= action by which a potential buyer and seller negotiate about the price
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

Node.gloss: to be willing|to accept (to do something)
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are willing to do something; often used in polite speech to soften one's request or to underline its sincerity
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement
= action by which a human or deity says or reveals something that is not true
literally: to turn; hence: = process by which humans or deities change their mind about a certain matter, ► which usually results in a different course of action
= the state of being or acting in an unjust or morally evil way
literally: to turn; hence: = process by which humans or deities change their mind about a certain matter, ► which usually results in a different course of action

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= the state of being or acting in an unjust or morally evil way

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= mouth cavity; ◄ part of human body; ► plays an important role in actions like speaking, blowing, kissing, biting, tasting, and chewing

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= process by which events take place that cause damage, distress, hurt, and/or loss of life
